featured.text: Whether simple or lavish, proms have always been more or less traumatic events for adolescents who worry about self-image and fitting in with their peers.
Soon after that, adolescent girls around the world began wearing their underwear outside their clothes.
So if you ask a troubled adolescent boy to tell you what his feelings are, he often cannot say much.
She has been writing a lot since her adolescent years.

definition.zh_def: 青少年，通常指介於青春期和成年之間的年齡階段，約在12至18歲之間。
definition.en_def: A young person in the process of developing from a child into an adult, typically between the ages of 12 and 18.
definition.example: The adolescent years can be challenging as teenagers seek their identity.
